abstract: Violence between Christians and Muslims in Central African Republic, precipitated by killing of Muslim man, escalates with escape of 500 prison inmates; chaos erupts while transitional president Catherine Samba-Panza attends United Nations General Assembly.
lead_paragraph: Forty-two people have been killed in several days of clashes, including a teenage boy who was decapitated.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Hundreds Escape Prison Amid Days of Unrest
headline.print_headline: Africa; Central African Republic: Hundreds Escape Prison Amid Days of Unrest

snippet: Forty-two people have been killed in several days of clashes, including a teenage boy who was decapitated.
